name: Platris
description:
This is our take on Git hub Game off GameJam 2018. The topic was Hybrid, so we thought of merging of a presently overused game genre with a retro game.

And we came up with Platris,  Tetris with a twist.  Dodge the  tetraminos but do keep an eye on the score.  Cause the main goal is not just to survive...

Platform:  Windows (x64)

Developers:-

Programmer: Debayudh Rarhi

Design & Sound: Dennchen Lama

Artist: Monideep Chakraborty
